Backwards Gem

About


Sea Glass is the backwards gem. Traditional gems (such as diamonds, rubies or emeralds) are made by nature and refined by man. Sea glass is originally made by man but refined by nature to become smooth frosty beach found gems. Sea glass begins as bottles & glass that get tossed onto the shore or thrown into the water. It is then broken and tumbled smooth by the waves and currents. Nature acts like a big rock tumbler! It can take 5-50 years in a constant surf environment for sea glass to "become" sea glass. A quality piece of sea glass has no shiny spots, is well frosted and has smooth tactile edges.
